nodes.text: Tydis Neutronics was a company operating on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. They owned a cure for the Rot, a disease affecting Nar Shaddaa's poor residents, who were unable to afford it until Kallig obtained the cure from the Tydis Neutronics Warehouse and used it to cure the infected and win their support.
Tydis Neutronics appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
